import React from 'react'; import Header from '../partials/Header'; import Footer from '../partials/Footer'; function Support() { return (
{/* Site header */}
{/* Page content */}
{/* Hero section */}
{/* Section header */}

Get in touch with our team

Select a category to email the support team or contact us directly by using the form below.

{/* Items */}
{/* 1st item */}

Tech Support

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

{/* 2nd item */}

Website Issue

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

{/* 3rd item */}

Contact Sales

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

{/* 4th item */}

Live Chat

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

{/* 5th item */}

Affiliate Program

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

{/* 6th item */}

Billing & Account

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

{/* Contact section */}
{/* Section header */}

Have a question about Simple? Contact us directly

{/* Contact form */}
By clicking "send" you consent to allow Simple to store and process the personal information submitted above and agree to our terms and conditions as well as our Privacy Policy.
{/* Site footer */}
); } export default Support;
